data.text:
To increase her abilities even more, 
Taiki Shuttle is attending Summer Training Camp.
data.processed:
󠁿To increase her abilities even more, 
󠁿Taiki Shuttle is attending Summer Training Camp.

data.text: Haaa… haaa… and, Goal!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Haaa… haaa… and, Goal!

data.text:
Haa, haa… fuuu. 
With this, am I finished with training?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Haa, haa… fuuu. 
󠁿With this, am I finished with training?

data.text:
Okay! Truth is, 
there's something I want to do together.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Okay! Truth is, 
󠁿there's something I want to do together.

data.text:
When it comes to training camp… there's also barbeques! 
I've been really, really looking forward to it because of that!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿When it comes to training camp… there's also barbeques! 
󠁿I've been really, really looking forward to it because of that!

data.text:
I was so excited that I looked up some things on the net! 
There's lots of delicious things to be found in nature!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿I was so excited that I looked up some things on the net! 
󠁿There's lots of delicious things to be found in nature!

data.text:
That's why-… 
let's find some really fresh ingredients, and have a barbeque!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why-… 
󠁿let's find some really fresh ingredients, and have a barbeque!

data.text:
Since training's over, she should probably be 
resting now, but… Taiki Shuttle was gazing 
at me with eyes filled with expectations.
data.processed:
󠁿Since training's over, she should probably be 
󠁿resting now, but… Taiki Shuttle was gazing 
󠁿at me with eyes filled with expectations.

data.text:
Fuooooo~~! Good! 
Thank you! Let's get going then!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Fuooooo~~! Good! 
󠁿Thank you! Let's get going then!

data.text: Funfunfuuun!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Funfunfuuun!

data.text:
Looking right and looking left. 
If this is the place, then there should be mushrooms around here.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Looking right and looking left. 
󠁿If this is the place, then there should be mushrooms around here.

data.text:
They should be way more fresh than the ones sold in stores. 
Let's look for the ultimate mushrooms!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Be careful of ones with poison-

data.processed:
󠁿They should be way more fresh than the ones sold in stores. 
󠁿Let's look for the ultimate mushrooms!

data.text:
Aaaaahhh?! Trainer-san! 
Look at this!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Aaaaahhh?! Trainer-san! 
󠁿Look at this!!

data.text:
Red with white dots…! Don't tell me, if you eat these 
you'll become giant like those legendary mushrooms?!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Red with white dots…! Don't tell me, if you eat these 
󠁿you'll become giant like those legendary mushrooms?!

data.text:
Trainer-san, keep your eyes opened too! 
Do you want to eat these? Okay! Let's get them!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Trainer-san, keep your eyes opened too! 
󠁿Do you want to eat these? Okay! Let's get them!

data.text: Poison?! Oh… they're so cool though, that's too bad…
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Poison?! Oh… they're so cool though, that's too bad…

data.text:
Ah! How about those? 
They're rainbow-colored and look so tasty!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Ah! How about those? 
󠁿They're rainbow-colored and look so tasty!

data.text:
…maybe she just wanted to go gather mushrooms. 
Taiki Shuttle was in high spirits and when I followed after her-
data.processed:
󠁿…maybe she just wanted to go gather mushrooms. 
󠁿Taiki Shuttle was in high spirits and when I followed after her-

data.text: …at some point we ended up at the beach.
data.processed: 󠁿…at some point we ended up at the beach.

data.text:
Oh! Trainer-san! It's the ocean! When you think of the ocean you 
think of… shellfish! Sea urchin! Let's go!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Oh! Trainer-san! It's the ocean! When you think of the ocean you 
󠁿think of… shellfish! Sea urchin! Let's go!

data.text: Before I could stop her, Taiki Shuttle ran towards the ocean!
data.processed: 󠁿Before I could stop her, Taiki Shuttle ran towards the ocean!

data.text:
Fuu~! I found a lot of shellfish! 
Trainer-san's favorites are probably mixed in too!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Fuu~! I found a lot of shellfish! 
󠁿Trainer-san's favorites are probably mixed in too!

data.text: Alright, please follow me!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, please follow me!

data.text:
Even though it's summer, if she's this soaked 
she might still catch a cold…

choices.text: Wouldn't it be easier to just buy some…?
choices.processed: <size=40>Wouldn't it be easier to just buy some…?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿Even though it's summer, if she's this soaked 
󠁿she might still catch a cold…

data.text:
No! These are fresh, you know! Fresh! 
I want the tastiest ones!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿No! These are fresh, you know! Fresh! 
󠁿I want the tastiest ones!

data.text: Alright, let's keep hunting! Here we go!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Alright, let's keep hunting! Here we go!

data.text:
Wow! Trainer-san, it's a field! There's lots of treasures here! 
Japan's vegetables are tasty so I love them!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Wow! Trainer-san, it's a field! There's lots of treasures here! 
󠁿Japan's vegetables are tasty so I love them!

data.text:
Looks like there's an old man working there right now. 
Let's see if he'll share some with us if we help him out!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Looks like there's an old man working there right now. 
󠁿Let's see if he'll share some with us if we help him out!

data.text: Let's go! Go go goooo!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Let's go! Go go goooo!!

data.text:
And, heave-ho!… Fuo. Old man! 
With this, we've finished pulling all the weeds!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿And, heave-ho!… Fuo. Old man! 
󠁿With this, we've finished pulling all the weeds!

data.text:
Oh yeah! Both of you, thanks for helping. 
As promised, take whichever vegetables you'd like.
data.name: Elder Farmer
data.processed:
󠁿Oh yeah! Both of you, thanks for helping. 
󠁿As promised, take whichever vegetables you'd like.

data.text:
Yeaaaah! Thank you!…fufu! 
Trainer-san, which vegetables should we pick?
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Yeaaaah! Thank you!…fufu! 
󠁿Trainer-san, which vegetables should we pick?

data.text: Once we choose these~…we'll finally be ready for the finale!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle

choices.text: Starting prep for a barbeque now is…

data.processed: 󠁿Once we choose these~…we'll finally be ready for the finale!

data.text:
No problem! Leave it to me! 
C'mon, Trainer-san! Hurry up!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿No problem! Leave it to me! 
󠁿C'mon, Trainer-san! Hurry up!

data.text:
With Taiki Shuttle hurrying me, we chose some vegetables. 
And then what awaited was-
data.processed:
󠁿With Taiki Shuttle hurrying me, we chose some vegetables. 
󠁿And then what awaited was-

data.text: Welcome to a Happy Barbeque Party—!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Welcome to a Happy Barbeque Party—!!

data.text:
On the beach, probably borrowed from the training camp 
facilities, there was a barbeque set already prepared…!

choices.text: W-when did you set this up?!

data.processed:
󠁿On the beach, probably borrowed from the training camp 
󠁿facilities, there was a barbeque set already prepared…!

data.text: Truth is, I woke up early to get prepared!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Truth is, I woke up early to get prepared!

data.text:
That's why, I was glad you didn't say [No] 
when I asked you to come with me.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I was glad you didn't say [No] 
󠁿when I asked you to come with me.

data.text:
We were able to safely gather all the ingredients so, 
it'll definitely be an especially tasty barbeque!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿We were able to safely gather all the ingredients so, 
󠁿it'll definitely be an especially tasty barbeque!

data.text: Please accept this hospitality from me!!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Please accept this hospitality from me!!

data.text: Fufuu, Trainer-san, thank you for helping me!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Fufuu, Trainer-san, thank you for helping me!

data.text:
…whenever I'm feeling lonely and sad. 
You're always there for me, Trainer-san.
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿…whenever I'm feeling lonely and sad. 
󠁿You're always there for me, Trainer-san.

data.text:
That's why, even if my family isn't here, 
everyday I'm full of smiles!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, even if my family isn't here, 
󠁿everyday I'm full of smiles!

data.text:
And that's why, I realized. 
To me, Trainer-san is definitely-
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿And that's why, I realized. 
󠁿To me, Trainer-san is definitely-

data.text: My important, "Japanese Family"!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿My important, "Japanese Family"!

data.text:
That's why, I'm treating you to the barbeque my family in America 
loves, so Trainer-san can learn about it too!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿That's why, I'm treating you to the barbeque my family in America 
󠁿loves, so Trainer-san can learn about it too!

data.text: Fufu, yes! My surprise was a success!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed: 󠁿Fufu, yes! My surprise was a success!

data.text:
Alright! Trainer-san, what do you want to eat first? 
Leave the service to me!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿Alright! Trainer-san, what do you want to eat first? 
󠁿Leave the service to me!

data.text:
These ingredients are all for you, Trainer-san! 
These are all here so Trainer-san can eat them!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿These ingredients are all for you, Trainer-san! 
󠁿These are all here so Trainer-san can eat them!

data.text:
I'll put my heart in to cooking these for you. 
Please eat your fill!
data.name: Taiki Shuttle
data.processed:
󠁿I'll put my heart in to cooking these for you. 
󠁿Please eat your fill!

data.text:
Taiki Shuttle's barbeque filled not only my stomach, 
but my heart as well.
data.processed:
󠁿Taiki Shuttle's barbeque filled not only my stomach, 
󠁿but my heart as well.
